CHAT.comment: UNITED STATES, Petitioner v. EFRAIN SANTOS AND BENEDICTO DIAZ
The above-entitled matter came on for oral argument before the Supreme Court of the United States at 11:04 a.m.
ORAL ARGUMENT OF MATTHEW D. ROBERTS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
ORAL ARGUMENT OF TODD G. VARE ON BEHALF OF RESPONDENTS
REBUTTAL ARGUMENT OF MATTHEW D. ROBERTS ON BEHALF OF THE PETITIONER
(Whereupon at 12:00 noon, the case in the above-entitled matter was submitted.)
